home.title: Atelier Archilles
home.subtitle: Where Light Meets Artistry
home.description: Premier photography studio offering world-class facilities for photographers, artists, and creatives.

about.heading: We're here to capture moments that transcend time, and create spaces where creativity flourishes.
about.description1: is a premier photography studio offering world-class facilities for photographers, artists, and creatives. From intimate portrait sessions to bold fashion shoots - we provide the canvas for your vision.
about.description2: Founded with a passion for the craft, Atelier Archilles is where technical excellence meets artistic freedom. Our studios are designed to inspire, equipped to deliver, and ready to elevate your work.

closing.text1: We believe in spaces that inspire - environments where technical mastery and creative freedom converge to produce extraordinary work.
closing.text2: This is photography elevated. This is Atelier Archilles.

studioA.title: Studio A — The Portrait Sanctuary
studioA.description1: Our flagship studio, designed for intimate portrait work and creative experimentation. Natural light floods through oversized windows, while professional lighting rigs offer infinite control.
studioA.description2: Perfect for headshots, fashion editorials, and artistic portraits that demand both precision and soul.

studioB.title: Studio B — Product Perfection
studioB.description1: Clean, minimal, and endlessly versatile. Studio B is engineered for product photography and commercial work that demands pixel-perfect results.
studioB.description2: Professional seamless backdrops, precision lighting, and ample space for elaborate setups. Your products deserve to shine.

studioC.title: Studio C — Fashion Forward
studioC.description1: The largest of our spaces, built for movement, drama, and grand visions. High ceilings, expansive floor area, and professional-grade equipment make this the perfect stage for fashion shoots and large productions.
studioC.description2: From runway-inspired editorials to avant-garde concepts - this is where bold ideas come to life.

makeup.title: Makeup Studio — Beauty Refined
makeup.description1: A dedicated space for hair and makeup artistry. Professional mirrors, perfect lighting, and all the amenities needed to prepare for your shoot.
makeup.description2: Complete with styling stations and comfortable seating - the ideal preparation space for models, clients, and creative teams.

cookies.title: Cookie Notice
cookies.message: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. Essential cookies are necessary for the site to function, while analytics cookies help us improve our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Atelier Archilles booking system, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

bookings.title: Bookings and Reservations
bookings.content1: All studio bookings must be made through our online booking system. A booking is confirmed only after successful payment through our secure payment gateway (Barion).
bookings.content2: You will receive a confirmation email with your booking details and a unique booking code. Please keep this code for your records.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content1: Payment is required at the time of booking. We accept payments through Barion payment gateway. All prices are listed in Hungarian Forints (HUF).
payment.content2: Invoices will be provided upon request during the checkout process.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content1: Free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before your scheduled session. Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the booking will not be refunded.
cancellation.content2: To cancel your booking, use the cancellation link provided in your confirmation email or enter your booking code on our website.

studio.title: Studio Usage
studio.content: You are responsible for the proper use of studio equipment and facilities. Any damage caused during your session may result in additional charges. The studio must be left in the same condition as you found it.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Atelier Archilles is not liable for any loss, damage, or injury occurring on the premises beyond what is required by Hungarian law. Clients are responsible for their own equipment and belongings.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please contact us at info@atelierarchilles.com

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Atelier Archilles respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect the following information when you make a booking:

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: Your information is used solely for processing bookings, sending confirmations, and providing customer support. We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties except as necessary to process payments (Barion) and send emails.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences. Analytics cookies help us improve our website. You can control cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal data. You may also object to processing or request restriction of processing. Contact us to exercise these rights.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. All payment information is handled securely through Barion's PCI-DSS compliant platform.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, contact us at privacy@atelierarchilles.com
